text: You walk into the library in awe of the rows and rows of books that stand before you. As you browse through the many books you can’t help but wonder over to one that says “Ancient Evil Sealed” Odd name for a book you think to yourself, but it’s that title that caught your eye in the first place so maybe that makes it a good one? As you ponder on this question you open the book, apparently it’s a puzzle book. But as you look over it you can’t help but remember that the boss is waiting on those apples.
